channel.title: Letter - Coded Instruments (letter T) No. 4
channel.description:
Hey guys! Welcome to the 4th practice challenge! This is based off by @BHR's letter-coded instruments idea (Iâ€™m really real sorry BHR) & since Iâ€™m bored and finished school (Iâ€™m ready for middle school), I decided to inspire him. Now without further ado, here are the rules:
* Create a song using only instruments, samples, and kits that match the letter chosen for the challenge. * This means that the first letter of the Instrument, sample, or kit should match the selected letter. * For example, if the letter B is chosen, you would choose instruments like *Bo* or *Brocoli* , use kits like *Battery* , and use samples like *Big Light* or *Bright Clap* . * Empty Kits are allowed as long as they contain only samples that start with the chosen letter for the challenge. * You can also use imported packs but with samples that only have the chosen letter for the challenge. * If you break one of these rules, youâ€™ll be disqualified. Anyone got me?
Okay, we got through all the rules including the ones I made. **This challengeâ€™s letter will be T**
Good luck & wish you all the best, everybody! **Entries are due July 1 at 12 (noon), CT.** (please note there are no rewards and this is mainly for practicing your musical skills) Okay thatâ€™s all I have for today! Thanks & have a great day. ðŸ˜˜

item.title: Letter - Coded Instruments (letter T) No. 4
item.dc:creator: lemonboy
item.description:
Hey guys! Welcome to the 4th practice challenge! This is based off by @BHRâ€™s letter-coded instruments idea (Iâ€™m really real sorry BHR) & since Iâ€™m bored and finished school (Iâ€™m ready for middle school), I decided to inspire him. Now without further ado, here are the rules:

  • Create a song using only instruments, samples, and kits that match the
    letter chosen for the challenge.
  • This means that the first letter of the Instrument, sample, or kit should match the selected letter.
  • For example, if the letter B is chosen, you would choose instruments like Bo or Brocoli , use kits like Battery , and use samples like Big Light or Bright Clap .
  • Empty Kits are allowed as long as they contain only samples that start with the chosen letter for the challenge.
  • You can also use imported packs but with samples that only have the chosen letter for the challenge.
  • If you break one of these rules, youâ€™ll be disqualified. Anyone got me?

Okay, we got through all the rules including the ones I made.
This challengeâ€™s letter will be T

Good luck & wish you all the best, everybody!
Entries are due July 1 at 12 (noon), CT.
(please note there are no rewards and this is mainly for practicing your musical skills)
Okay thatâ€™s all I have for today! Thanks & have a great day.
